body:
Hey everyone, Dryve here! I am a Canadian gaming youtuber :D I just got minecraft recently and am very new to the game, but I will be making some minecraft videos for my channel! My good friend MLGPorky convinced me to get minecraft and join avicus, so a big thanks to him! Looking forward to lots of fun times :D

Here's a link to my channel if any of you wanna check it out :D
www.youtube.com/c/dryvegaming
body_tagged:

title: It's Dryve! (Introducing myself)

replies.body: Hi, see you a lot in the comments of Porkey's videos. Welcome to Avicus and Minecraft! Hope you enjoy it here.

replies.body: Thanks man! And I'm sure I will, this seems like a pretty awesome server :)
